casebody.data:
U.S. BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, Trustee
v.
Andrew WALBERT, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 30, 2017

Andrew Walbert, self-represented, in support of the petition.

David M. Bizar, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 907, 154 A.3d 91 (2017), is denied.
